meta.title: Contract #010: Dark Pattern
meta.description: TRAFFIC CONTROL: Hub structure detected. One event triggers multiple outcomes.
meta.journal: Aethelgard Logistics parked three trucks at key intersections simultaneously. It wasn't an accident; it was a blockade designed to stop the protest march from reaching City Hall.

nodes.text: 08:00 - Traffic HQ: Main Artery 'Green Wave' disabled manually.
--:-- - Intersection C: Aethelgard Truck dumps cargo.
08:05 - Driver Log: 'Mechanical failure on all vehicles.'
08:30 - City Cam: Protest march halted by gridlock.
